application.views

Class CardRowView

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.views.CardRowView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CardRowObserver, UIComponent, java.rmi.Remote

    public class CardRowView
extends java.lang.Object
implements UIComponent, CardRowObserver
    Card row views are the rows of cards that can be seen on the playing field.
    Author:
    Sanchez
